title: Kalista Bugs? [GAMEPLAY]

embed.description: Gyazo lets you instantly grab the screen and upload the image/GIF to the web. You can easily share them on Chat, Twitter, Blog, Tumblr, etc. Available for Windows, Mac and Linux.

body:
I guess you would call them bugs. I've never really done this kind of thing.

First off, when I used her Blood Moon Kalista skin a few days ago and did her taunt. Her mask disappeared and it showed this weird, scary-looking purple face. I asked my friends in the game and they said they were sure it wasn't supposed to do that. I then went to go check the Skin Spotlight and yeah. They were right. It's still doing this even after the new patch. I'm actually in a custom to check right now.

(The face is really creepy, dude--)

Second, I played a lot of Kalista recently because I decided "Hey. I wanna learn Kalista." I had no problems with her W before, aiming from the Minimap or otherwise, and now it randomly likes to put out a ghost in another direction for a shorter distance or in the same direction for a shorter distance. I don't know if it's supposed to do that or not. I'm just saying I had no problems with it before and I suddenly do so it might be a bug?

replies.body: Also Kalista bug, when Master Yi throws Q on her, if she jumps (passive) after he Qed, he will reappear where she was before she jumped. Playing as Yi today, happened a few times, quite annoying.

Hey A baby piggy,

Thanks for the report!

I had no problems with her W before, aiming from the Minimap or otherwise, and now it randomly likes to put out a ghost in another direction for a shorter distance or in the same direction for a shorter distance.
